titleStmt.title: Whereas in expectation of conformity to the laws of the land, concerning uniformity of common-prayer and service in the church and the administration of the sacraments ... by the Lords Justices and Council, Mau. Eustace canc., Orrery.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Eustace, Maurice, Sir, ca. 1590-1661.
Orrery, Roger Boyle, Earl of, 1621-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 3 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin, the 30. day of April, 1662."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
